short_summary: Procurement of Vehicular Power Transmission Components, Miscellaneous Electric Power and Distribution Equipment, ADP Components, along with Computer Subassembly, Control Assembly, and parts kit
full_summary:
### Tender Information

#### RFP Title
* English Title: Spare Parts
* French Title: Pièce de Rechange

#### Tender Reference
* Reference Number: PW-22-01011704
* Amendment Number: 2
* Solicitation Number: W8486-238724/A

#### Tender Details
* Tender Closing Date: *December 7, 2022, 2:00 PM EST*
* Expected Contract Start Date: N/A
* Expected Contract End Date: N/A
* Current Tender Status: Expired

#### Notice Description
The Department of National Defence has a requirement for spare parts, consisting of seven items. Deliveries are to be made to the following locations:
* 25 CFSD Montreal
* 7 CFSD Edmonton
by March 31, 2023. Bidders proposing equivalent or substitute products must provide detailed information.

#### Tender Categories
* Type: Competitive - Open bidding
* Category: GD
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal

#### Procurement Requirements
* GSIN Codes:
	+ NIBS 26150 (Vehicular Power Transmission Components)
	+ NIBS 56150 (Miscellaneous Electric Power and Distribution Equipment)
	+ NIBS 7050 (ADP Components)
* NSN Numbers:
	+ 6150-20-013-2014 (Wiring Harness)
	+ 6150-20-013-2016 (Wiring Harness, branched)
	+ 7050-20-010-8775 (Computer Subassembly)
	+ 2520-20-013-2589 (Parts Kit, Control Assembly, Gate Lever Shift)

#### Bidder Instructions
Bid submissions must be made electronically via email only to the following address:
DLP53BidsReceiving.DAAT53Receptiondessoumissions@forces.gc.ca

#### Contact Information
Department of National Defence
101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2, Canada
Email: TIFFANY.DAGENAIS@forces.gc.ca

#### Attachment
The tender documents may be downloaded from the following links:
English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/28/f91408a7d705345c0787e9b8f9a05212/rfp_english_-_W8486-238724.docx
French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att
